altTitles.ja: ママ活、はじめます (恋も仕事も失ったけど宝くじが当たったので)

altTitles.en: Mama Katsu, I'll Start (I Lost My Love And Work, But I Won The Lottery)

altTitles.ja-ro: Mamakatsu, Hajimemasu (Koi mo Shigoto mo Ushinatta kedo Takarakuji ga Atatta node)

description.en: Junko who was deceived by her lover and lost her love and work due to her affair. She won 5 million in the lottery, but her mood didn't clear and she desperately desperately ... What appeared in front of her was ... a mysterious younger handsome guy !? " Why don't you live with me?" (I lost my job, but I won the lottery.)
